strapiEvent.name: Spring Swing
strapiEvent.organization: NWA Swing Dance Society and the University of Arkansas Swing Kids RSO
strapiEvent.location: Verizon Ballroom in the University of Arkansas Union
strapiEvent.description:
Come to our party. A Spring Swing dance party! Hit the dance floor and swing out all night to great live music by the Rachel B Band!

Find the fun in the Verizon Ballroom on the 5th floor of the U of A Union. Free parking in the Stadium Drive Parking Garage next door. https://goo.gl/maps/Y2azxvQduDxYKNgXA

Prize drawings!

Photo Booth!

6:00 – 6:45 Intro-to-Swing lesson

7:00 – 10:00 Social dance

Open to the public. All ages and experience levels welcome. No partner required.

Tickets at the door:

$10 – general admission

$8 – students with an ID
